Head: Violent, neuralgic, intermittent headaches
Becomes almost insane with pain, which is piercing and stabbing
Uncontrollable sleeplessness from pain in head with melancholy
Female: Ovaralgia; pain shoots down limbs, even to foot
Extremities: Severe pain in neck and spine
Cannot sit still; must keep legs in constant motion

details: A remedy for NEURALGIA, hysteria, angina pectoris, and other PAINFUL affections, notably in OVARIAN AFFECTIONS. Epilepsy without aura. Hysterical heart-pain. FACIAL neuralgia, violent in left temple and inferior maxillary. Sleeplessness in children. Obstinate HICCOUGH.
name: Zincum valerianum
dosage: First and second trituration. Must be continued for some time in treatment of neuralgia.
